title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2761/98 of 18 December 1998 providing for an increasing of a Community tariff quota bound in GATT for newsprint coming from Canada (1998)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2761/98 of 18 December 1998 providing for an increasing of a Community tariff quota bound in GATT for newsprint coming from Canada (1998)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quota volume for order No 09.0015 is increased by 30 000 tonnes for the year 1998.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1998.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 176, 27. 7. 1995, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 188, 2. 7. 1998, p. 1.
